snippet: “Borgen,” a hard-to-find Danish drama, features a female prime minister who leans on her trusted male adviser to handle battles as conspiratorial and ruthless as any Borgia power struggle.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column on Borgen, a Danish television drama about a female prime minister who leans on her trusted male adviser to handle political power struggles; says show manages to squeeze a remarkable amount of suspense and drama out of day-to-day political machinations.
lead_paragraph: “Borgen,” a hard-to-find Danish drama, features a female prime minister who leans on her trusted male adviser to handle battles as conspiratorial and ruthless as any Borgia power struggle.

headline.seo: ‘Borgen,’ a Danish Political Drama Series, on Link TV
headline.main: She Seems to Have It All, a Whole Nation in Fact
headline.print_headline: She Seems to Have It All, a Whole Nation in Fact
